TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Takofan, title = Takofan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Takofan} }

S.FORM: alang Takofan ga niya mki sku Tayto Keng atu Ku'ang sang go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 359 buwan, 1,048 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 55% kyan ku 578 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 45% kyan ku 470 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Amis 52%, saySiyat 1%, binah lihuyan s'uli 1%. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Takofan hya' ga wsilung krahu'. tay 'zil na Takofan hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkyahu' na Takofan hya' ga Kano go. tay mkraya' na Takofan hya' ga Chishang. tay mkyahu' na Takofan hya' ga Parupu. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy maki 1 pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy. tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Takofan ga niya mki sko Tayto Keng ato Ko'ang sang go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 359 bowan, 1,048 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 55% kyan ko 578 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 45% kyan ko 470 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Amis 52%, saySiyat 1%, binah lihoyan s'oli 1%. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Takofan hya' ga wsilong kraho'. tay 'zil na Takofan hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay mkyaho' na Takofan hya' ga Kano go. tay mkraya' na Takofan hya' ga Chishang. tay mkyaho' na Takofan hya' ga Paropo. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy maki 1 pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy. toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
